tags.name: IP Lookup APIs
tags.description: This collection contains APIs for IP Lookup Utility

post.summary: Create IP Lookup with Origin header
post.description: This API creates entry for IP Lookup and also creates mapping for associated customer.

post.summary: List of Page Views for provided domains
post.description: This API provide page view information and first and last page info for provided domains.

get.summary: List of IP Lookup Unique Domains
get.description: This API fetches List of Unique IP Lookup domains.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: List of IP Lookup Unique Domains
post.description: This API fetches List of Unique IP Lookup domains.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.description: This API authenticates customer with secret key.

post.summary: Create IP Lookup with Customer Secret Key
post.description: This API creates entry for IP Lookup and also creates mapping for associated customer.

get.description: This API fetches List of Page Visit History entries against provided IP for provided customer key.

parameters.name: fromIpHitTime
parameters.description: From IP Hit Time filter in UTC. Required Date time format is : yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm

parameters.name: toIpHitTime
parameters.description: To IP Hit Time filter in UTC. Required Date time format is : yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

IPLookupRequestDto.description: 'ipCaptureDateTime' - Capture time (in UTC) of IP in your system. Required Date time format is : yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm
